name: Silent Island (Weronika Piasecka)
description:
The Silent Island tells the story of a secret agent who has no name - they are not mentioned even once during the game. She is a survivor who is on her own after a plane crash that she manages to survive. She has no tools or weapons and, navigating through the woods, she must find a transmitter and return to the wreckage of her plane to transmit a signal using the black box - her only chance for rescue.

During her journey she comes across a mysterious letter, which will turn out to be the beginning of a terrifying mystery. Solving it will be necessary to complete the game and save her life. 

There is one secret ending, will you be able to find it?

This is my first game as a Game Design Student. I'm just learning so please be understandable. Enjoy! :)

If you liked my game or not please give me feedback: My Twitter
